managed-bean.description: Stores constants for use in Java classes
Creates and coordinates singletons for use during all users' visits.
Responsible for pulling and pushing property data from database to object model
Responsible for reading code enforcement action requests into and out of the PostgreSQL Database
Connects application to the database for tasks related to retrieving and storing information about a single person (modeled as a Person object)
Interfaces between business objects, the integration layer, and jsf beans
Utility class for producting a hash map of action requestor types
Coordinates view-coordinator ignteractions around code enforcement actions
Used by the submission system for action requests
Provides backing bean utilities for the action requestmanagement.xhtml page
Backing bean for the action request checking form and results page.
Backing bean for ActReqSubConf.xhtml confirmation of action request - public
Creates a result set of possible municipalities
Utility application-scoped bean for handling blob upload and download
Handles storing and retrieving of BLOBs to/from the database
